verses.text:
They that trust in the LORD
shall be as mount Zion,
which
 cannot be removed,
but abideth for ever.

As the mountains
are round about Jerusalem, so the LORD
is round about his people from henceforth even for ever.
For the rod of the wicked shall not rest upon the lot of the righteous; lest the righteous put forth their hands unto iniquity.

Do good, O LORD, unto
those that be good, and
to them that are upright in their hearts.

As for such as turn aside unto their crooked ways, the LORD shall lead them forth with the workers of iniquity:
but peace
shall be
 upon Israel.

They that trust in the LORD
shall be as mount Zion,
which
 cannot be removed,
but abideth for ever.
As the mountains
are round about Jerusalem, so the LORD
is round about his people from henceforth even for ever.
For the rod of the wicked shall not rest upon the lot of the righteous; lest the righteous put forth their hands unto iniquity.
Do good, O LORD, unto
those that be good, and
to them that are upright in their hearts.
As for such as turn aside unto their crooked ways, the LORD shall lead them forth with the workers of iniquity:
but peace
shall be
 upon Israel.
